entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h in the morning. High minus 9.
